Cracked Skull.name: Crânio Rachado
Cracked Skull.description: Triples damage to HP on aimed headshots (rather than the normal double damage).

Damaged Ear.name: Orelha Danificada
Damaged Ear.description: If move more than 4m/yds in a Turn, cannot move next turn. -2 to hearing based Perception.

Foreign Object (H).name: Objeto Estrangeiro (H)
Foreign Object (H).description: Recebe dano crítico no final do turno se andou mais de 4m/jardas.

Lost Ear.name: Orelha Perdida
Lost Ear.description: Ear is removed. If move more than 4m/yds in a Turn, cannot move next turn. -4 to hearing based Perception.

Lost Eye.name: Olho Perdido
Lost Eye.description: Eye is removed. -4 to Ranged Attacks and vision based Perception.

Whiplash.name: Chicote
Whiplash.description: No other effects beyond increasing the base Death Save Penalty by 1.
